name: Marvel Iron Man
details: Unleash the power of Iron Man with this highly detailed action figure. Join Tony Stark on his adventures and save the world from threats!

name: Transformers Optimus Prime
details: Experience the epic battles of Transformers with Optimus Prime. Convert this figure from robot to vehicle mode and lead the Autobots to victory!

name: DC Marvel Mashup
details: DC and Marvel had previously collaborated on a treasury edition of The Wizard of Oz, but this is the first time characters owned by both companies were used together.

name: Marvel Hulk
details: Gigantic, green, irradiated, mutated humanoid monster with incredible strength and an inability to control his rage

name: Transformers Bumblebee
details: Bumblebee is a small yellow Volkswagen Beetle.

name: 'DC Comics Flash
details: The Flash is the name of several superheroes appearing in American comic books published by DC Comics.

name: DC Comics Wonder Woman
details: Unleash the power of Wonder Woman and join her in the fight against evil. This figure embodies strength, courage, and compassion!

name: Marvel Captain America
details: Become a hero with Captain America and defend justice and freedom. This figure represents unwavering determination and leadership!

name: Transformers Starscream
details: Join the Decepticons with Starscream and unleash chaos and destruction. This figure is highly detailed and ready for battle!

name: DC Comics Superman
details: Soar through the skies with Superman and protect the world from any threat. This figure captures the power and iconic status of the Man of Steel!

name: Marvel Spider-Man
details: Swing into action with Spider-Man and experience the thrill of being a friendly neighborhood superhero. This figure is ready to take on any challenge!

name: Transformers Soundwave
details: Join the Decepticons with Soundwave and infiltrate enemy lines. This figure includes a transforming cassette player and loyal minions!

name: DC Comics Batman
details: Become the Dark Knight with Batman and protect Gotham City from its darkest threats. This figure includes iconic gadgets and a cape that glides!

name: Marvel AntMAN
details: Embrace the power of Antman and wield the Multiverse. This figure captures the strength and brings the excitement of multiverse to life!
